mapper.insert: insert into BNF_EVENT_BNF_IMAGES (ID_BNF_EVENT_BNF_IMAGE, ID_BNF_EVENT, NM_BNF_EVENT_BNF_IMAGE, URL_BNF_EVENT_BNF_IMAGE) values (#{idBnfEventBnfImage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idBnfEvent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nmBnfEventBnfImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlBnfEventBnfImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
